text: Nimusenge Imana yanyu y’ukuri kandi ntimuyigereranye n’ibindi bintu, kandi mubagirire ineza abavyeyi banyu uko ari babiri, hamwe n’abagenzi n’impfuvyi hamwe n’aboro hamwe n’ababanyi bari hafi yanyu hamwe n’ababanyi bakure yanyu hamwe n’abagenzi bari mumbavu zanyu, hamwe n’uwuri murugendo rwononekaye, hamwe nabo mwitungiye bari mumaboko yanyu y’iburyo, ntankeka Imana ntikunda abantu bishima n’ukwibona
